description:
This lightweight insulated vest for alpine activities provides optimal protection and high levels of insulation while weighing very little. The outer material is breathable, wind and water-resistant Tec Stretch, while lightweight 70g/m² Swisswool provides an insulating lining. The arm holes fit comfortably around the shoulders, ensuring the Swisswool Piz Duan Vest for men moves with your body. This lightweight insulated vest can be completely packed away in its own breast pocket and attached to your belt via loops. So it can be grabbed quickly, even on difficult terrain.
The Swisswool Piz Duan Vest for men has an unbeatable weight-to-insulation ratio that makes it the best possible companion for high alpine activities: whether on a tour in summer or a ski tour in winter.
name: Ortovox Swisswool Piz Duan Vest - Mens
